title: "X Champion is getting a buff they don't deserve!!!"
body: "First, let me tell you that this Champion is fine, and DOES NOT need buffs without providing any actual proof. Next, I'll tell you about the times when X champion is strong, and it was terrible to face, to bring back the bad memories to help make you side with me. Lastly, I'll use the comments that agree with my mindless, no-proof post as reasoning that what I say is the truth, and insult those who disagree."

Lets turn that around, what proof is there that Lux needs a 15 second CD on her ultimate?

That is late game, when she kills someone with it. When she has a full cdr build.

Considering her cooldowns are quite low for other artillery/burst mages, they are pushing her ult away from waveclear, giving her incentive to flash fry champions with it instead of creep waves.

You've got the 20% CDR from Morellonomicon at least, which means at level 16 landing a kill with the ult puts it on a 20 second cooldown, so between 15-20 seconds with a fairly normal build. 

It's not going to push her away from using it for wave clear, since there's no punishment for using it for wave clear. If anything, we might see her using it for wave clear more often, since she can get a kill in a skirmish, then back off and ult the wave as well.

Edit: At level 6 with a Morellonomicon + kill it'll be up in 45 seconds, compared to the current level 16 with a Morellonomicon being up 40 seconds.
Then add a second to the cooldown for every minion she kills with it. :^)

Except you ignore a lot of other stats.

Her average winrate in high Elo with experienced players is only 52% which is really freaking low for those who are dedicated mains. 

* Ahri has a 56% winrate with dedicated mains
* Xerath has a 55% winrate with dedicated mains
* Ziggs has a 56% winrate with dedicated mains
* Syndra has a 57% winrate with dedicated mains

(Stats pulled from their Lolalytics.com pages)

You can't only look at Average winrate, because that isn't the only stat there. Dedicated mains are meant to have a higher than average winrate because of how good and familiar they are with their champion. Lux is only at 52% with her dedicated mains, which actually why she is weak and needs buffs.
